titleStmt.title: SII 7.1036: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 1036. (A.R. No. 403 of 1902). IN THE SAME PLACE.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . tirumanni vaḷara tirunila maṭaṉtaiyum porcceyap pāvaiyum cirtaṉic
celviyun taṉ peruṉteviyarāki Iṉpuṟa neṭutu Iṭai veli paṭar vaṉavāciyum cuḷḷi
ccūḻ naṇṇak karaṇmuraṇ maṇṇaikkaṭakkamum poruka liḻattaraicar tam muṭiyum Āṅkavar
teviyar Oṅkeḻil muṭiyurum muṉnāvanpakkar teṉnavaṉ vaitta cuṉtaran muṭiyum Iṉtira
nāramum teṇṭirai Īḻamaṇṭala m muṟaimaiyiṟ cūṭum kula
ya pukaḻmuṭiyūrum ceṅkatirmālaiyūrum peruṅkāval pala paḻantivum
torukāl Aracūkaḷai kaṭṭa paracurāmaṉ meyvaru mpoṟ tiruttaku muṭiyu
kiṭṭuoḷitta cayaciṅka naruḷperum pukaḻoṭu piṭi lakkamum navanetiku
laikaḷum vikkiramavira cakārakoṭṭamum mutirvaṭa paḻan mācuṇitecamum
kitti Atiṉakkaravaiyil caṉtiraṉ tolkulatt tintarātaṉai tu palatanattuOṭu niṟai
ḷainarum ciṟuvaṉai Oṭṭaviḻaiyum pūccuraceṉaikaḷarucalaina muraṇaṟittu vaṉṭuṟaico
iraṇakkaraṉai muraṇukakākki catirakkaṇattilatintakkaṇṇa tecam taṉmāviḻantoṭa
ṅālātompa koṭuṅkalite kāmaimayi ñcamar viḷākat tañcivittaruḷi Ōṇṭiṟal yāṉaiyum pe
ṇṭāramum veṟimalarttirukka teṟipunal kaṅkaiyu malaikaṭal naṭuvuḷ palakalañ celutti caṅkirāmavicayattuṅkappaḷḷiyum kiṭāratara
yiṟ piṟaṅkiya perunetip piṟakkavum Ā n nākaneykoṭṭamum pūkaṇaippaḷḷiyum Āḻkaṭa lakaḻ cūḻ māyiruṭiṅkamum kalaṅkāvalviṉai
Ilaṅkātecamum kāppuṟa niṟaipunal māppiravāḷamum kalāmutir kaṭuṉtiṟal Alāmuritecamum torukaṭal kāval kaṭumuṟaṟ kiṭāramum taṇṭā
l koṇṭa kopparakecaripaṉmarāṉavuṭaiyār śrīrājentracoḻadevaṟku yāṇṭu 3 10 1Āvatu nittavinotavaḷanāṭṭu
nāṭṭu brahmadeyam tiripuvanamāteviccaruppetimaṅkalattu peruṅkuṟi mahāsabhaiyom
Ivvāṇṭu kaṟkaṭakanāyaṟṟu pūrvvapakṣattu caturtthiyum veḷḷikkiḻamaiyum peṟṟa puṇarpū
catti nāḷ dharmmiceytu nammur tripuvanamātevippereri Uḷḷāl Eḻuntaruḷiyirunta tirukkiḷāvuṭaiya mahā
tevar koyilil tirumuṟṟatte kūṭṭaṅ kuṟaivaṟak kūṭi yiruntu paṇittuc ceyya vyavasthaiyāvatu Ittirukkiḷā
devar Ivveriyil munpu Anupavittuvarukiṟa nilam nāṅka ḷiṟaiyili ceytukuṭut
cirama lantūmpukku melaioḻukupaṟṟukku meṟkum tiruvaraṅkavatiyin melaicatirattukku
e kkaraikku teṟkum naṭuvuḷpaṭṭa nilam nirvari vakittiṟai Ellaiyāka koṇṭu Ittevaṟkut tiruviḻāppu
ttu vyavasthai ceytukuṭuttom Ipperuṅkuṟi mahāsabhaiyom śrīrājentracoḻaccerip piṟāntū
ṇakarninṟānpaṭṭa somayājiyār paṇiyālum tiripuvanamātevicceri tekkūr kūttāṭidipran paṇiyālu
ḻitevacceri puṟattu Irāmatevapaṭṭar paṇiyālum maturāntakacceri vaṅkippuṟattu Agnicit
m jananāthaccerit tirupper centan tirunilakaṇṭabhaṭṭar paṇiyālum pavitramāṇikkacceri naṭātūr kumārasva
santayājiyar paṇiyālum paṇippaṇiyāla vyavasthaittiṭ ṭeḻutinen Ivvūr kaṇakkan madhyastan veṅkaṭavan vempa
tappiriyan Eḻuttu . piṟāntūr tiruviṇṇakarninṟānbhaṭṭasya tekkūr kūttāṭibhaṭṭasya piremapuṟattu śrīrāmadeva
sya vaṅkippuṟattu Agnicittabhaṭṭasya tirupper centan tirunilakaṇṭabhaṭṭasya naṭātūrk kumārasvāmibhaṭṭasya .
This inscription is full of mistakes of commission and omission.
Digital edition of SII 7.1036 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
